title: Dua Lipa shows off her quirky sense of style in a bright blue top as she steps out in NYC
text:
She has been spending time in New York with her boyfriend Anwar Hadid.

Yet Dua Lipa appeared to be making a solo outing on Friday afternoon, as she was spotted without her beau during a stroll through the Big Apple.

The singer, 24, showcased her typically quirky style as she stepped out in a blue jacket with graphic chequerboard print panels and knotted detailing.

Cool: Dua Lipa appeared to be making a solo outing on Friday afternoon, as she was spotted without her beau during a stroll through the Big Apple

She teamed the top with a pair of black flared trousers, while adding inches to her frame with a pair of chunky platform trainers.

Dupa toted a leather bag which boasted the same chequered print on the front, while showing off her funky neon green manicured nails.

The star showcased her two-tone locks, which are currently blonde at the front and raven at the back, by working them up into a high ponytail.

Casual: The singer, 24, showcased her typically quirky style as she stepped out in a blue jacket with graphic chequerboard print panels and knotted detailing

On Thursday night, the pair attended Bella Hadid's 23rd birthday bash at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan.

The fashionable couple joined Anwar's other sister Gigi, 24, and their mother Yolanda, 55, as well as several of Bella's model pals at the party.

Anwar wore his contrasting coat and sock combo to the party but appeared to have a different top on.

Details: Dupa toted a leather bag which boasted the same chequered print on the front, while showing off her funky neon green manicured nails

Dua showed off her fashion credentials in a glittering black and purple two-piece of a jacket and mini skirt which featured tassels.

She wore black tights and stiletto heels while flashing a neon manicure as she carried a red leather handbag emblazoned with the word 'Dealer'.

While their relationship is still new, it seems the couple are getting serious.

Bold: On Thursday night, the pair attended Bella Hadid's 23rd birthday bash at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan (pictured)

Sources claim the pair are renting an apartment in New York so they don't have to be apart so much.

'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' an insider told The Sun.

The couple started dating in late June, shortly after Dua's split from on-off boyfriend of five years, chef and model Isaac Carew, 33, earlier that month.
description: The singer, 24, showcased her typically quirky style as she stepped out in a blue jacket with graphic chequerboard print panels and knotted detailing.
